cast.name: 玛丽亚·古丽基娜 Maria Guleghina

trans_title: 普契尼：图兰朵公主（陈凯歌导演版）
introduction: 瓦伦西亚的索菲娅王后歌剧院为纪念普契尼诞辰150周年，特邀陈凯歌执导制作的《图兰朵》Zubin Mehta leads the Orquestra de la Comunitat Valenciana in this production of Puccini's final opera staged at Valencia's Palau de les Arts in May, 2008. This visually spectacular production from Chinese film director Chen Kaige features performances from Maria Guleghina, Marco Berti, Alexia Voulgaridou, and Alexander Tsimbaliuk
